item.title: A Community Challenge for Inferring Genetic Predictors of Gene Essentialities through Analysis of a Functional Screen of Cancer Cell Lines.
Combining tumor genome simulation with crowdsourcing to benchmark somatic single-nucleotide-variant detection.
Global optimization of somatic variant identification in cancer genomes with a global community challenge.
